short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check your Hacktoberfest 2017 progress here. It is a fan made chrome extension and is not affiliated to hacktoberfest officially.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hacktoberfest is open to everyone. Pull requests can be made in any GitHub-hosted repositories/projects. You can sign up anytime between October 1 and October 31. Check your Hacktoberfest 2018 progress here. It is a fan made chrome extension and is not affiliated to Hacktoberfest officially.
